record.dc:title: 35RH41 Hampton Farm Site 86RH41, Rhea County, Tennessee. Pit number 39, Circular pit with body slightly kettle-shaped. Outline etched for contrast. Stratum II (lower). Sq. 18R2. Direction south-southeast.
record.wpa:narrative: Circular pit with body slightly kettle-shaped, sides sloping to flat bottom. Filled with dark humic soil and loose, cracked stone, some ash mixed with fill material.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution.
